desc: 1. PREVENT FROM SLIPPING- The bottom of RIOLAND stair treads use anti-slip material 2. NO DAMAGE TO STAIRS- Won't leaves RESIDUE and cause DAMAGE to the stairs 3. NO NEED TAPE/GLUE TO INSTALL-Just need to remove backing film cover of the treads, put them on floors and PRESS to make them firmly applied 4. EASY TO CLEAN

layout.text: To Be Reliable Safety Guard of Your Family and Pets
